categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems laws and acts

nodes.text: The Geonosian accord was a treaty that officially founded the Confederacy of Independent Systems after it had been formed two years prior in 24 BBY. The agreement was ratified by the Separatist Council at a secret meeting on the planet Geonosis in the year 22 BBY, shortly before the outbreak of the Clone Wars between the Separatists and Galactic Republic.
